name: Ghost Chicken
description:
First Game Project in Class!Ghost Chicken is a game where you are a ghost chicken and you have to kill chickens inside a pen while getting chased by two farmers named Joe. You can also collect candy corn or pumpkins. As you kill more chickens and collect candy corn or pumpkins, your score increases.Controls:W or up arrow- UpwardA or left arrow - LeftS or down arrow - DownwardD or right arrow - RightGhost Chicken music source

https://mixkit.co/free-stock-music/
